title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-5.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-5.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to authorize workers' compensation and employers' liability insurers to provide coverage as afforded under Executive Law, article 6-G. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-5.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
